00010 void sprite::execute()
00011 {
00012         point prev_pos;
00013         point poi;
00014         myConsole sgc = gc;
00015         sgc.gto.txo_bgcolor.v = GrBlack();
00016         while (1)
00017         {
00018                 control.wait();
00019                 if (updatePoint.x != -1)
00020                         sgc.printAtXY(itobs(prev_value, bitLength), updatePoint.x, updatePoint.y);
00021                 for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)
00022                 {
00023                         poi = m_path.GetPointByPercentage(i);
00024                         GrBitBlt(NULL, prev_pos.x - 10, prev_pos.y - 10, &cur_blackboard->ctemp, prev_pos.x - 10, prev_pos.y - 10, prev_pos.x + 10, prev_pos.y
00025                                         + 10, GrWRITE);
00026                         GrFilledCircle(poi.x, poi.y, 5, GrAllocColor(0, 0, 255));
00027                         prev_pos = poi;
00028                         i++;
00029                         relax(50);
00030                 }
00031                 if (updatePoint.x != -1)
00032                         sgc.printAtXY(itobs(new_value, bitLength), updatePoint.x, updatePoint.y);
00033                 GrBitBlt(NULL, prev_pos.x - 10, prev_pos.y - 10, &cur_blackboard->ctemp, prev_pos.x - 10, prev_pos.y - 10, prev_pos.x + 10, prev_pos.y + 10,
00034                                 GrWRITE);
00035                 relax(1000);
00036         }
00037 
00038 }
